dcterms:description: A classic control problem where a pole is balanced on a moving cart. The objective is to keep the pole upright by moving the cart left or right.
dcterms:title: Cartpole

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A reinforcement learning environment where a car must learn to drive up a hill. The car must build enough momentum to reach the goal at the top of the hill.
dcterms:title: Mountain Car

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A reinforcement learning environment where a two-link robot arm must swing to a vertical position and balance.
dcterms:title: Acrobot
